name: Infinite Overtake
description:
Overtake cars as long as you wish with your customized car on an endless road.

Keyboard Controls:
Space: Open/Close Menu
Arrow Keys: Throttle, brake, turn right/left
T: Change transmission type (Automatic/Manual/CVT)
A: Gear up, Z: Gear down
D: Change driving mode (Eco/Trip/Sport/Race)
C: Change camera view
F: Full screen
